text: ==J01A Tetracyclines== ===J01AA Tetracyclines=== :J01AA01 Demeclocycline :J01AA02 Doxycycline :J01AA03 Chlortetracycline :J01AA04 Lymecycline :J01AA05 Metacycline :J01AA06 Oxytetracycline ==J01E Sulfonamides and trimethoprim== ::Subgroups J01EA–E are only included in the human ATC classification. ===J01EA Trimethoprim and derivatives=== :J01EA01 Trimethoprim :J01EA02 Brodimoprim
